author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Franklin Resources Announces Month-End Assets Under Management
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Franklin Resources Inc:
* FRANKLIN RESOURCES, INC. ANNOUNCES MONTH-END ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT
* FRANKLIN RESOURCES INC - ‍PRELIMINARY MONTH-END ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT OF $744.9 BILLION AT FEBRUARY 28, 2018, COMPARED TO $770.8 BILLION AT JANUARY 31, 2018​
* FRANKLIN RESOURCES INC - ‍PRELIMINARY AVERAGE ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT FOR QUARTER, THROUGH FEBRUARY 28, 2018, WERE $756.5 BILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
